subtests.name: Tokenization of "noopener" should skip window features separators before feature
Feature "noopener" should be converted to ASCII lowercase
After "noopener", tokenization should skip window features separators that are not "=" or ","
Tokenizing "noopener" should ignore window feature separators except "," after initial "=" and before value
Tokenizing "noopener" should read characters until first window feature separator as `value`
Integer values other than 0 should activate the feature
Integer value of 0 should not activate "noopener"
Invalid feature names should not tokenize as "noopener"
